Package my.uum

Class TelegramBot

java.lang.Object
org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.bots.AbsSender
org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.DefaultAbsSender
org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.TelegramLongPollingBot
my.uum.TelegramBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.LongPollingBot, org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.TelegramBot
public class TelegramBot extends org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.TelegramLongPollingBot
This class is to send message and receive message by using BotUsername and BotToken.

    • onUpdateReceived

      public void onUpdateReceived(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Update update)
      This method is used to send command and receive message from TelegramBot. This program includes the admin and user parts. User: register as user, update user details, book meeting room, cancel booking, view booking list and available room list Admin: register as admin, add room, update room, check booking list Methods in the same class will be called in this method.
